participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and hardworking, with a passion for music and a dream to pursue a career in it despite facing challenges.
participant_1.background: I play the piano and guitar and sing. My favorite type of music to sing is folk music. My parents aren't very supportive of my dream. I also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Curious and family-oriented, excited about the future while enjoying intellectual pursuits like documentaries and reading.
participant_2.background: My favorite kind of movie is a documentary. I'm pregnant with my first child. I live with my husband in Pennsylvania. I read a book every week.
